issue.title: github.io
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.45.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://aquarchitect.github.io/swift-algorithm-club/Shunting%20Yard/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList, EasyList Germany, EasyPrivacy, Fanboy's Annoyances, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard, I don't care about cookies, EasyList Cookie List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

github pages links (github.io) are being blocked universally by the french filter

Example site https://aquarchitect.github.io/swift-algorithm-club/Shunting%20Yard/ : 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49326973/203446806-ab6380d0-aa35-4509-9b7a-aafdf23dc026.png)

Pages that load resources from github are also affected:
https://ryochan7.github.io/ds4windows-site/
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49326973/203447186-1bcb0939-bb18-4a8b-9432-723ee87a5d52.png)



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Same here. Quite half the internet is broken now üòÖ 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10920280/203447854-f9e93016-aafa-4c49-8b2e-dd5cfb8a4e4b.png)

issue.title: dfm.ru + https://dfm.ru/mobile + https://rusradio.ru/mobile + https://maximum.ru/mobile/
issue.body:

AdGuard Content Blocker

2.7.0

Firefox, Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Yandex Browser, other(specify in comment below)

Mobile

dfm.ru

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://vnexpress.net/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvnexpress.net%2F) ### Comment > Looks like this site is starting to check the browser for ad blocking and giving warnings. > > Some scripts I found that haven't blocked: > https://la2.vnecdn.net/static/adp_banner.js > https://s1.vnecdn.net/vnexpress/restruct/j/v1282/eclick/ea3.js > https://adp.vnecdn.net/delivery/eclookup.html > > https://urlscan.io/result/e06e5ee4-89a4-49f8-aeb0-8d9ba0420237/#transactions > > Full URL > https://adp.vnecdn.net/syncuser?fosp_uid=42dzdhe2ml2krph6.1669173960.des&fosp_aid=42dzdhe2ml2krph6.1669173960.des&orig_aid=42dzdhe2ml2krph6.1669173960.des&myvne_user_id=0 > Requested by > Host: s1.vnecdn.net > URL: https://s1.vnecdn.net/vnexpress/restruct/j/v1282/eclick/ea3.js > > Full URL > https://adp.vnecdn.net/delivery/eclookup.html?fosp_aid=42dzdhe2ml2krph6.1669173960.des&orig_aid=42dzdhe2ml2krph6.1669173960.des&fosp_uid=42dzdhe2ml2krph6.1669173960.des&myvne_user_id= > Requested by > Host: scdn.eclick.vn > URL: https://scdn.eclick.vn/delivery/asset/333635569/adsbyeclick.js > > Full URL > https://adp.vnecdn.net/fopt.js?aid=42dzdhe2ml2krph6.1669173960.des&uid=42dzdhe2ml2krph6.1669173960.des > Requested by > Host: s1.vnecdn.net > URL: https://s1.vnecdn.net/vnexpress/restruct/j/v1282/eclick/ea3.js ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.twitch.tv

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you‚Äôre using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you‚Äôre using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.twitch.tv/moonmoon](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fmoonmoon) ### Comment > So the stream turns black when ads are sent to play. Adguard freezes and refreshing the page doesn't always fix it. the second screenshot provided is Adguard disabled and the page auto-refreshed itself and went back to the stream. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/MshO4qv.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/sUkSTkq.jpg)
